euInitiatives:
We follow key EU policy developments in areas such as: Financial services, Energy, Digital agenda, Audit and non financial reporting. We have also participated to EU consultations which are public on the your EU your voice website http://ec.europa.eu/yourvoice/consultations/index_en.htm


Regarding EU audit reform, our principle has been to ensure that legislation would help enhance the quality of audits and financial reporting for the benefit of the Capital markets both within the EU and around the world.
Looking forward focus will be on monitoring of this legislation across the EU and EEA. Going forward, we continue to engage in debate of areas such as the future role of audit, better corporate reporting, tax and corporate governance.
